entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:59 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 3:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: SSW 34 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
